 net.sf.json.JSONArray sendText(net.sf.json.JSONArray numberJarray, java.lang.String msg)
           發送簡訊，ACTION = SEND_TEXT NUMBER_JARRAY MSG numberJarray必須為JSON的格式
範例 : [{"NUMBER":"0988123654","NAME":"dian","CHECK_KEY":"0001"},{"NUMBER":"0999147852","NAME":"mary","CHECK_KEY":"0002"}]
三項必須屬性NUMBER-號碼 NAME-接收者名稱CHECK_KEY-交易代號

收訊電話號碼 - 國際簡訊規格 : (+或是00)(國碼 )(去0之手機號碼).

sendText

public net.sf.json.JSONArray sendText(java.lang.String number,
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String checkKey,
                                      java.lang.String msg)

sendText

public net.sf.json.JSONArray sendText(net.sf.json.JSONArray numberJarray,
                                      java.lang.String msg)

發送簡訊，ACTION = SEND_TEXT

NUMBER_JARRAY MSG numberJarray必須為JSON的格式
範例 : [{"NUMBER":"0988123654","NAME":"dian","CHECK_KEY":"0001"},{"NUMBER":"0999147852","NAME":"mary","CHECK_KEY":"0002"}]
三項必須屬性
  • NUMBER-號碼
  • NAME-接收者名稱
  • CHECK_KEY-交易代號


    • 收訊電話號碼 - 國際簡訊規格 : (+或是00)(國碼 )(去0之手機號碼).
    例 : +8613913560366 or 008613913560366
    國際簡訊自動以國際簡訊計費
    台灣與大陸(不含香港、澳門)之手機門號無論是否帶入國碼都可為有效號碼

    接收者名稱
    (最好有，以便客戶查詢發訊結果時知道收訊人的姓名)
    如果無，SMSe自動以收訊號碼當作收訊人姓名

    Parameters:
    numberJarray - - 傳送的對向
    msg - - 要傳送的訊息
    Returns:

    queryLog

    public net.sf.json.JSONArray queryLog(java.lang.String dateStr)

    發送簡訊，ACTION = QUERY_LOG

  • DELIVRD…….成功
  • UNDELIV…….空號
  • TELERR………號碼錯誤
  • EXPIRED……..失敗
  • ERR……………無法送達
    • [{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:09:25","NUMBER":"0910054930","STATUS":"DELIVRD","CHECK_KEY":"0001"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:09:27","NUMBER": "0999054930" ,"STATUS":"號碼錯誤","CHECK_KEY":"0002"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:12:41","NUMBER":"0910054930","STATUS":"DELIVRD","CHECK_KEY":"0001"},{ "DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:12:41" ,"NUMBER":"0999054930","STATUS":"號碼錯誤","CHECK_KEY":"0002"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:13:38","NUMBER":"0910054930" ,"STATUS":"DELIVRD","CHECK_KEY" :"0001"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:13:38","NUMBER":"0999054930","STATUS":"號碼錯誤","CHECK_KEY":"0002"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:16:02" ,"NUMBER":"0910054930" ,"STATUS":"DELIVRD","CHECK_KEY":"0001"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:16:02","NUMBER":"0910054930","STATUS":"DELIVRD","CHECK_KEY" :"0002"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:52:45" ,"NUMBER":"0910054930","STATUS":"DELIVRD","CHECK_KEY":"0002"},{"DATE":"2009/12/24 下午 04:52:45","NUMBER" :"0910054930","STATUS":"DELIVRD","CHECK_KEY":"0002"}] dateStr日期條件格式為2009/12/25

    Parameters:
    dateStr - -日期條件
    Returns:
    回傳內容為JSON格式，陣列形態，每個項目由
  • DATE-發送時間
  • NUMBER-發送號碼
  • STATUS-送送狀態
  • CHECK_KEY-檢查碼

    • main

    public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
    Parameters:
